issues_found: Transaction confirmation timeout set too high in SupplyChainService
Potential race condition in transaction confirmation
recommendations: Reduce waitForTransactionReceipt timeout from 120s to 30s for Anvil
Standardize on wagmi's built-in writeContract with config parameter instead of manual transaction flow
Remove redundant role validation in UI components that duplicate contract checks
Ensure consistent use of publicClient.waitForTransactionReceipt instead of importing from @wagmi/core
